entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gogama
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain and a few flurries ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries near midnight. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 20 gusting to 50 late this evening then west 30 gusting to 60 overnight. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind west 30 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
